column5: I really don't know where to post this but here goes.  I have posted photos of 22 Muskie on catch -n- forums and I'm giving away one of my books plus 2 of my buck tails.  You have t0 guess the biggest by Lenght and Weight for the book.    The smallest fish.  First right pick gets a buck tail.  The first right pick on the longest fish gets a buck tail.  Good Luck.  Bob
What's the link to the pics???  Sounds pretty cool!
Here is the link to the photos...I think  http://www.catch-n.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=8513  Enjoy! Tony
Nice fish Bob, I'm on dial up so I can only get to picture 16 but here goes.  Longest : Pic #9  Shortest :Pic #7  Biggest: Pic #16, 54.5", 51lbs 3oz  Do you need my address ?
Longest #8, just like the fact he landed that on a sailboat
Well Gb your close to the weight of the biggest .  #7 Is longer than it looks

You should join that site it really is great. Hoggie that runs the Radio Show is going to interview me for the March 23rd show.  He is also going to interview Bob Devine.  They is all kinds of neat stuff going on up there.  What I like the best is it is directed to the kids.  Bob
I'll check it out and register. Do I still count as a kid at 26 ?  It's always good to see the kids out having fun fishing.
You wouldn't be my oldest Grandson so maybe you would. LOL
